name: Rideth or Dieth
description:
Made for Miz Jam 2020. An action RPG where you are a horse and must save the town from destruction.

WASD or arrow keys to move.

J to attack.

Space to Jump.

Game by me. 

Music by Father Playstation. (https://soundcloud.com/user-32866374)

c3 source file: https://github.com/Robot-Girlfriend/rideth-or-dieth
